arts.ttl: Sheffield United 0-1 Cardiff City: Blades Bow Out of FA Cup
arts.sum: Sheffield United bowed out of the FA Cup after suffering a 1-0 defeat at home to Cardiff City in the third-round. The Bluebirds scored the only goal of the game in the first half through youngster Cian Ashford, who calmly slotted the ball beneath the onrushing Adam Davies. arts.ttl: Fulham fly past Watford as Cardiff dump Sheffield United out of FA Cup
arts.sum: Fulham 4-1 Watford: Marco Silva’s side continued their unbeaten run as they booked their spot in the fourth round

arts.ttl: Ashford strike earns Cardiff win at Sheffield United
arts.sum: Cardiff City forward Cian Ashford's 19th-minute striker was enough to earn his side a 1-0 win over Sheffield United in their FA Cup third round match at Bramall Lane.

arts.ttl: Cian Ashford scores as Cardiff beat Sheffield United to secure FA Cup progress
arts.sum: Ashford marked his eighth senior start for Sky Bet Championship relegation battlers Cardiff with a first-half strike that settled the tie.

arts.ttl: Sheffield United 0-1 Cardiff City: Ashford's solo stunner sees Bluebirds through to FA Cup 4th round
arts.sum: The Bluebirds travelled to Bramall Lane for tonight's FA Cup third round clash and won 1-0

With ten minutes left of the contest, skipper Ralls went close to marking the occasion with a goal, as he fired narrowly wide of the post after some good work from Pearce to lay him off. Ashford was again involved as he cut inside from the left, before firing a wicked strike towards goal, forcing Davies to tip the ball behind.

arts.ttl: Ashford fires Cardiff ahead against Sheffield United
arts.sum: Cardiff City forward Cian Ashford fires his team ahead against Championship rivals Sheffield United in the FA Cup at Bramall Lane.

arts.ttl: Sheffield United v Cardiff City Live: Kick-off time, TV channel and FA Cup score updates
arts.sum: The Bluebirds travel to Bramall Lane for tonight's FA Cup third round clash

arts.ttl: ‘He has no future’ – Disaster loan at Cardiff City rakes up ‘lazy’ accusation towards player
arts.sum: Last summer, Hertha BSC allowed Wilfried Kanga to join Cardiff City on a season-long loan deal without any option or obligation to buy. The striker joined the Championship side after spending last season on loan at Standard Liège, where he managed 12 goals and three assists from 37 games. arts.ttl: 100th Anniversary of Sheffield United’s FA Cup Final Win Over Cardiff
arts.sum: It is fitting that this evening’s FA Cup Third Round tie against Cardiff City at Bramall Lane takes place in the year 2025. As this year marks a century since Sheffield United last won the trophy against Cardiff at (the Old) Wembley Stadium.
